name: VOCALOID Project
summary: Learn about .VPR files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Musicians use VOCALOID to create synthesized vocal tracks consisting of notes, lyrics, and virtual singing voices. Each VOCALOID version uses a different project file format. For example, VOCALOID5 and VOCALOID6 save projects as VPR files, while older versions used VSQX or .VSQ files.

Although VOCALOID5 and VOCALOID6 no longer save projects in the VSQX format, they can still open VSQX files created in earlier versions. If a user imports a VSQX project and saves it in VOCALOID5 or VOCALOID6, the software converts it to the VPR format.

instructions: You can open a VPR file with YAMAHA VOCALOID5 or VOCALOID6. Both programs are available for Windows and macOS.
Dreamtonics Synthesizer V also supports VPR files. You can open VPR files with Synthesizer V by selecting File â†’ Import.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
